item.name: Oracle Buffer busy waits
item.params: select to_char(time_waited, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$system_event se, v$event_name en where se.event(+) = en.name and en.name = 'buffer busy waits';

item.name: Oracle Bytes received via SQL*Net from client
item.params: select to_char(value, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$sysstat where name = 'bytes received via SQL*Net from client';

item.name: Oracle Bytes sent via SQL*Net to client
item.params: select to_char(value, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$sysstat where name = 'bytes sent via SQL*Net to client';

item.name: Oracle Count of active users
item.params: select to_char(count(*)-1, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$session where username is not null and status='ACTIVE';

item.name: Oracle DB file parallel write
Oracle DB file scattered read
Oracle DB file sequential read waits
Oracle DB file single write
Oracle Deadlocks (delta, simple change)
item.params: select to_char(value, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$sysstat where name = 'enqueue deadlocks';

item.name: Oracle Direct path read
Oracle Direct path write
Oracle Disk sorts ratio
item.params: SELECT to_char(d.value/(d.value + m.value)*100, 'FM99999990.9999') retvalue FROM v$sysstat m, v$sysstat d WHERE m.name = 'sorts (memory)' AND d.name = 'sorts (disk)';

item.name: Oracle Hard parse ratio
item.params: SELECT to_char(h.value/t.value*100,'FM99999990.9999') retvalue FROM v$sysstat h, v$sysstat t WHERE h.name = 'parse count (hard)' AND t.name = 'parse count (total)';

item.name: Oracle Index fast full scans (full) (delta)
item.params: select to_char(value, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$sysstat where name = 'index fast full scans (full)';

item.name: Oracle Intance is active and open
Oracle Last applied archive log (at standby)
Oracle Last archived log sequence
item.params: select to_char(max(SEQUENCE#), 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$log where archived = 'YES';

item.name: Oracle Latch free
Oracle Live DB
item.params: select to_char(1, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from dual;

item.name: Oracle Log file parallel write
Oracle Log file switch completion
Oracle Log file sync
Oracle Logons current
item.params: select to_char(value, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$sysstat where name = 'logons current';

item.name: Oracle Read Cache hit ratio
item.params: SELECT to_char((1 - (phy.value - lob.value - dir.value) / ses.value) * 100, 'FM99999990.9999') retvalue FROM v$sysstat ses, v$sysstat lob, v$sysstat dir, v$sysstat phy WHERE ses.name = 'session logical reads' AND dir.name = 'physical reads direct' AND lob.name = 'physical reads direct (lob)' AND phy.name = 'physical reads';

item.name: Oracle Redo Writes (delta)
item.params: select to_char(value, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$sysstat where name = 'redo writes';

item.name: Oracle Size of all datafiles
item.params: select to_char(sum(bytes), 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from dba_data_files;

item.name: Oracle Size of user data (without temp)
item.params: SELECT to_char(sum( NVL(a.bytes - NVL(f.bytes, 0), 0)), 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue FROM sys.dba_tablespaces d, (select tablespace_name, sum(bytes) bytes from dba_data_files group by tablespace_name) a, (select tablespace_name, sum(bytes) bytes from dba_free_space group by tablespace_name) f WHERE d.tablespace_name = a.tablespace_name(+) AND d.tablespace_name = f.tablespace_name(+) AND NOT (d.extent_management like 'LOCAL' AND d.contents like 'TEMPORARY');

item.name: Oracle SQL*Net roundtrips to/from client
item.params: select to_char(value, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$sysstat where name = 'SQL*Net roundtrips to/from client';

item.name: Oracle Table scan rows gotten (delta)
item.params: select to_char(value, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$sysstat where name = 'table scan rows gotten';

item.name: Oracle Table scans (long tables) (delta)
item.params: select to_char(value, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$sysstat where name = 'table scans (long tables)';

item.name: Oracle Uptime
item.params: select to_char((sysdate-startup_time)*86400, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$instance;

item.name: Oracle User Commits
item.params: select to_char(value, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$sysstat where name = 'user commits';

item.name: Oracle Usercount
item.params: select to_char(count(*)-1, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$session where username is not null;

item.name: Oracle User Rollbacks (delta)
item.params: select to_char(value, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$sysstat where name = 'user rollbacks';

item.name: Oracle Version
item.params: select banner from v$version where rownum=1;

discovery_rule.name: Oracle Jobs
discovery_rule.description: Обнаружение всех jobs в БД Oracle

item_prototype.name: JOB runtime on {#JOBOWNER}.{#JOBNAME}
item_prototype.params: SELECT nvl(max(work_minutes),0) FROM (SELECT owner, job_name, EXTRACT (HOUR FROM elapsed_time) * 60 + EXTRACT (MINUTE FROM elapsed_time) AS work_minutes FROM dba_scheduler_running_jobs WHERE owner = '{#JOBOWNER}' AND job_name = '{#JOBNAME}')
item_prototype.description: Время работы джоба, если не запущен то вернет 0

item_prototype.name: Job execution status on {#JOBOWNER}.{#JOBNAME}
item_prototype.params: SELECT status FROM dba_scheduler_job_run_details WHERE log_date = (SELECT MAX (log_date) FROM dba_scheduler_job_run_details WHERE owner = '{#JOBOWNER}' AND job_name = '{#JOBNAME}')

trigger_prototype.name: Job {#JOBNAME} running lasts more than 720 minutes

discovery_rule.name: Oracle Tablespaces
discovery_rule.description: Detection of all tablespaces in the Oracle DB

item_prototype.name: Used tablespace space % on {#TBSNAME}
item_prototype.params: select decode(100 - ceil(b.bytes_free/a.bytes_alloc*100), NULL, 100,100 - ceil(b.bytes_free/a.bytes_alloc*100)) "% used" from ( select f.tablespace_name, sum(f.bytes) bytes_alloc, sum(decode(f.autoextensible, 'YES',f.maxbytes,'NO', f.bytes)) maxbytes from dba_data_files f group by tablespace_name) a, ( select f.tablespace_name, sum(f.bytes) bytes_free from dba_free_space f group by tablespace_name) b where a.tablespace_name = b.tablespace_name and a.tablespace_name='{#TBSNAME}'

item_prototype.name: Max possible tablespace size on {#TBSNAME}
item_prototype.params: select round(maxbytes) Max from ( select f.tablespace_name, sum(f.bytes) bytes_alloc, sum(decode(f.autoextensible, 'YES',f.maxbytes,'NO', f.bytes)) maxbytes from dba_data_files f group by tablespace_name) a, ( select f.tablespace_name, sum(f.bytes) bytes_free from dba_free_space f group by tablespace_name) b where a.tablespace_name = b.tablespace_name and a.tablespace_name='{#TBSNAME}'
item_prototype.description: Maximum possible size of the tablespace

item_prototype.name: Free tablespace on {#TBSNAME}
item_prototype.params: select a.bytes_alloc from ( select f.tablespace_name, sum(f.bytes) bytes_alloc, sum(decode(f.autoextensible, 'YES',f.maxbytes,'NO', f.bytes)) maxbytes from dba_data_files f group by tablespace_name) a, ( select f.tablespace_name, sum(f.bytes) bytes_free from dba_free_space f group by tablespace_name) b where a.tablespace_name = b.tablespace_name and a.tablespace_name='{#TBSNAME}'

item_prototype.name: Available tablespace {#TBSNAME}
item_prototype.params: select round(b.bytes_free) "free B" from ( select f.tablespace_name, sum(f.bytes) bytes_alloc, sum(decode(f.autoextensible, 'YES',f.maxbytes,'NO', f.bytes)) maxbytes from dba_data_files f group by tablespace_name) a, ( select f.tablespace_name, sum(f.bytes) bytes_free from dba_free_space f group by tablespace_name) b where a.tablespace_name = b.tablespace_name and a.tablespace_name='{#TBSNAME}'

item_prototype.name: Current tablespace size on {#TBSNAME}
item_prototype.params: select round(a.bytes_alloc, 0) "size B" from ( select f.tablespace_name, sum(f.bytes) bytes_alloc, sum(decode(f.autoextensible, 'YES',f.maxbytes,'NO', f.bytes)) maxbytes from dba_data_files f group by tablespace_name) a, ( select f.tablespace_name, sum(f.bytes) bytes_free from dba_free_space f group by tablespace_name) b where a.tablespace_name = b.tablespace_name and a.tablespace_name='{#TBSNAME}'

trigger_prototype.name: Free space in less than 3% on tablespace {#TBSNAME}
trigger_prototype.description: Если размер tablespace менее 3 Тб то триггер срабатывает при использованном пространстве более 97%

trigger_prototype.name: Free space in less than 49GB on tablespace {#TBSNAME}
trigger_prototype.description: Если размер tablespace более 3 Тб, но менее 10 Тб - то триггер срабатывает при оставшемся использованном пространстве менее 49 Гб

trigger_prototype.name: Free space in less than 99GB on tablespace {#TBSNAME}
trigger_prototype.description: Если размер tablespace более 10 Тб то триггер срабатывает при оставшемся использованном пространстве менее 99 Гб

trigger_prototype.name: Free space in less than 99GB on tablespace {#TBSNAME}
trigger_prototype.description: Если размер tablespace более 3 Тб, но менее 10 Тб - то триггер срабатывает при оставшемся использованном пространстве менее 99 Гб

trigger_prototype.name: Free space in less than 199GB on tablespace {#TBSNAME}
trigger_prototype.description: Если размер tablespace более 10 Тб то триггер срабатывает при оставшемся использованном пространстве менее 199 Гб

trigger.name: Read Cache Hit ratio on server {HOSTNAME}
Oracle database server {HOSTNAME} has just been restarted!
